In the following table you get an overview of the file structure after you extracted the downloaded package.


  * *_config*
    Configuration files of the framework.
  * *_core/*
    Important files of the framework. Here you should not change anything!
  * *_libs/* (opt.)
    External classes made by yourself.
  * *_logs/*
    Log files and error log files.
  * *temp/*
    Used for internal purposes.
  * *main/*
    The default project of the framework.
    * *_config*
      Configuration files of the project.
    * *_controller*
      Controller files.
    * *_forms*
      Form definitions for the Form class.
    * *_i18n*
      Configuration and translations for the used languages.
    * *_templates*
      Templates for (X)HTML output.
    * *_model* (opt.)
      your models for the project
    * *_libs* (opt.)
      your libs for the project
    * *images* (opt.)
      Your images for the project.
    * *temp*
      Temporary files for the project.
    * *xtras* (opt.)
      All files which do not fit into another folder (like JS files, SWF files ...).
